title: Use locked liquidity to buyback COMB and distribute through mining program
body:
On 24th Sep 2020 COMB-ETH pair liquidity was locked by Combine.finance team using unicrypt service:
https://app.unicrypt.network/amm/uni-v2/pair/0x6e168d4fD7569EA1C56d985256cd2E93ee12490e

On 24th Sep 2021 LP tokens will be unlocked and we'll be able to remove the liquidity (~1500 COMB and 28 ETH).

The idea is to remove the liquidity and use 28 ETH to buy more COMB from Uniswap (~1000 COMB), so that in total we'll get ~2500 COMB, which can be used to prolong the mining period for 500 days and give the development team extra time to finalize new milestones and make COMB ecosystem self-sustaining.

Additionally, this will push COMB price up for ~25%, which will lead to higher APYs and allow us to attract more stakers.
author: 0x35700c4a7BD65048f01D6675F09d15771c0fAcd5
